creator: gmcfall@blackboard.com
text:
If you use a nested tarfileset element in a tar task, the dir attribute of the 
tarfileset is ignored.  You must set the basedir attribute of the tar task, and 
this basedir attribute over-rides the dir attribute of the tarfileset.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1543 ***
